name: MonoChat
description: MonoChat is an AI orchestration platform that connects businesses with customers across WhatsApp, Instagram, and Messenger. It uses complex event processing and AI-driven workflows to automate customer interactionsâ€”responding instantly, personalizing experiences, and executing actions like CRM updates or membership activation. With support for low-code development and a powerful SDK, businesses can build custom apps, dashboards, and views tailored to their operations. MonoChat also offers multi-agent, multilingual support and real-time analytics to boost efficiency, reduce errors, and improve customer satisfaction at scale.
focus_areas: AI orchestration for seamless, automated customer engagement
Complex event processing for smart, responsive workflows
Build custom apps and dashboards with SDK and low code
